
Version 2.1
 * New: Pivot Editor
 * Fixed problem in HiDPI mode
 * Fixed some bugs

Version 2.0
 * New: Multibrush mode  
 * New: Grid mode
 * New: Slope filter
 * New: Select tool
 * New: Presets
 * Improved UI
 * Added tabs
 * Improved performance

 * NOTE: if you use PrefabPainter 1.x, remove it before update
